scripts.compile-css: VERSION="$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)";cd css && (cat bootstrap.css bootstrap-theme.css pygments-solarized.css custom.css | cleancss > style-$VERSION.css) && (cat cgit.css pygments-solarized.css | cleancss > style-cgit-$VERSION.css)
scripts.compile-js: VERSION="$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)";cd js && (cat bootstrap.js | uglifyjs > script-$VERSION.js)
scripts.postinstall: npm run compile-css && npm run compile-js && jekyll build
scripts.deploy: npm install && cd _site && zip -r ../_site.zip . && cd .. && scp _site.zip jakut.is: && rm _site.zip && ssh jakut.is "rm -r /home/jakutis/.local/share/dotfiles/blog-generated && unzip _site.zip -d /home/jakutis/.local/share/dotfiles/blog-generated && rm _site.zip && echo deployed"
